text: evarkal (tankal markkak kattalaiyai carivara niraiverra mutiyamal nirakarippavarkalin nattil iruntu kontu) tankalukkut tame tinkilaittuk kolkinranaro avarkalin uyirai vanavarkal kaipparrumpolutu (avarkalai nokki ‘‘markkak kattalaiyai niraiverratu) ninkal evvaru iruntirkal'' enru ketparkal. A(tarka)varkal ‘‘antap pumiyil nankal cirupanmaiyinarkalakave iruntom'' enru (patil) kuruvarkal. (Atarku vanavarkal) allahvutaiya pumi vicalamanatallava? Ninkal (irunta) avvitattai vittu veliyeri irukkaventama?'' Enru ketparkal. Ivarkalin otunkumitam narakamtan. Atu otunkum itankalil mikak kettatu
